what_clippy_lints_enforce_zero_unwrap.question: What Clippy lints enforce zero-unwrap philosophy?
what_clippy_lints_enforce_zero_unwrap.configuration: Use #![deny(clippy::unwrap_used)] and #![deny(clippy::expect_used)] attributes on lib.rs or main.rs of each crate
